迱字的基本解释

迱
yǐ
古同“迤”。

迱
yí
古同“迤”。

迱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuó］
［《廣韻》徒河切，平歌，定。］
见“迱逗”。
[②]［yí］
［《字彙補》余支切］
(1)见“逶迱”。
(2)移。

迱字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　迱； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1255第12
【廣韻】徒何切【集韻】唐何切，?音駝。逶迱，行貌。或作迤。通作佗、他。　又【字彙補】余支切，音移。與委蛇之蛇同。

迱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
迱字的起名意思

暂无。

Ye
Basic explanation of words
Ye
yǐ
The ancient same "Yi".
Ye
yí
The ancient same "Yi".
Ye
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tuó］
["Guangyun" Tu Heqi, Ping Ge, Ding. ]
See "Xiaodou".
[②]［yí］
[Remaining branch cut of "Zihuibu"]
(1) See "Tai Ling".
(2) Move.
Ye
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [The Department of the Characters of Zou] 　迱; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1255 No. 12
[Guang Yun] Tu He Qi [Ji Yun] Tang He Qi,? Sound camel.逶迱, appearance. Or make it. Tong Zuo, he.　[Word Supplement] The remaining branch cuts, the sound shifts. Same as the Snake of the Commissioned Snake.
